instruction: Propose an experiment to measure the effectiveness of a new advertising campaign for a product.
input: The new advertising campaign is for a brand of instant ice cream.
output: The experiment could measure the effectiveness of the new advertising campaign by comparing the sales of the instant ice cream before and after the campaign. A control group could be established by measuring the sales of similar products with no advertising. An analysis of the sales figures could then be undertaken to measure the effectiveness of the new advertising campaign.
